data.title: Rastko Ćirić
data.meta_description: Rastko Ćirić is a Serbian multimedia artist and educator. His fields of interest are graphics, illustration, logo design, ex-libris, comics, animation and music. He has won more than 70 local and international awards. He is a professor at the Faculty of Applied Arts in Belgrade.
data.text:
Rastko Ćirić (Serbian Cyrillic: Растко Ћирић, pronounced [râstko tɕîritɕ]; born 24 May 1955) is a Serbian multimedia artist and educator. His fields of interest are graphics, illustration, logo design, ex-libris, comics, animation and music. He has won more than 70 local and international awards. He is a professor at the Faculty of Applied Arts in Belgrade.[1]
